title: Cigar Snobs And Aficiondos
itunes:title: Cigar Snobs And Aficiondos
description: In this episode of The Cigar Authority, the guys are plagued in the first hour by technical difficulties. However, they rally for another great edition of the program! David and Mr. Jonathan discuss and compare two of the industries most popular magazines: Cigar Aficionado  and Cigar Snob. It's a crazy two hours, so please join us for another edition of the cigar authority!
